item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

[quote=“eld0002, post:15, topic:308518”][quote author=muhedin link=topic=404957.msg2995177#msg2995177 date=1255545127]
ALL IT SHOWS IS THE TEXT FOR ME NUTHING ELSE =?
[/quote]
Well your Class9 Loading methods are wrong, make sure it goes to your folder with the sprites in it.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 14, 2009, 09:25:52 pm[/size][hr][quote author=thewtfclan link=topic=404957.msg2994996#msg2994996 date=1255532040]
i cant see ‘accept’ button is there a way to fix?
[/quote]
Make sure to make it have a 0 at the end, remember the Space before the zero, should work then.[/quote]

I used this and made the accept buttons with hovering.

item.title: Agility Interface
item.dc:creator: @eld0002 eld0002
item.description:
@eld0002 wrote:

[center][size=15pt]Server Side[/size][/center]
[center]Ok What i did was make a NPC and you talk to him and he opens the Interface.
My NPC was 484.
Make Sure to add a Character Variable as AP, (Savegame.java, Player.java)
After you have made him go to ActionButtons.java
Put this in There:[/center]

case 78042: c.closeInterface(); c.RemoveAllWindows(); break; case 78028: if(c.AP >=5) { c.addSkillXP(10000, 16); c.CAM().sendMessage("You have been Granted 10,000 Agility Experience."); c.AP -=5; c.RemoveAllWindows(); c.closeInterface(); break; } else { c.CAM().sendMessage("You Don't have 5 Agility Points.");; c.RemoveAllWindows(); c.closeInterface(); break; } case 77243: if(c.AP >=20) { c.addSkillXP(50000, 16); c.CAM().sendMessage("You have been Granted 50,000 Agility Experience."); c.AP -=20; c.RemoveAllWindows(); c.closeInterface(); break; } else { c.CAM().sendMessage("You Don't have 20 Agility Points."); c.RemoveAllWindows(); c.closeInterface(); break; } case 77251: if(c.AP >=50) { c.addSkillXP(200000, 16); c.CAM().sendMessage("You have been Granted 200,000 Agility Experience."); c.AP -=50; c.RemoveAllWindows(); c.closeInterface(); break; } else { c.CAM().sendMessage("You Don't have 50 Agility Points."); c.RemoveAllWindows(); c.closeInterface(); break; } case 78053: if(c.AP >=200) { c.addItem(2705, 1); c.CAM().sendMessage("Congratulations!, You have Recived your Agility Skillcape."); c.AP -=200; c.RemoveAllWindows(); c.closeInterface(); break; } else { c.CAM().sendMessage("You Don't have 200 Agility Points."); c.RemoveAllWindows(); c.closeInterface(); break; }
[center]Now go to Client.java, And add [/center]

if (NPCID == 484) { if(AP >= 200) { CAM().sendQuest("@gre@200 Points", 20020); } else { CAM().sendQuest("@red@200 Points", 20020); } CAM().sendQuest(""+playerLevel[16]+"", 19966); CAM().sendQuest("@gre@"+AP+"", 19999); skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX; skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY; showInterface(19950); }
My Coding may be Differant to yours, Just remove the CAM(), if your coding doesnt have it. This will work, but do it for the action buttons code aswell, Thanks Guys.
Crazyfaze

Read full topic

item.title: Agility Interface
item.dc:creator: @eld0002 eld0002
item.description:
@eld0002 wrote:

[size=20pt]My First Interface, Dont get Snappy.[/size]

Sprites:
http://www.plunder.com/-download-ff442f61d1.htm

vym81c.png765×503

Add This to your Client9.java

public static void AgilityInterface(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) { Class9 intAgilityInterface = addDTab(19950); intAgilityInterface.anIntArray240 = new int[72]; intAgilityInterface.anIntArray241 = new int[72]; intAgilityInterface.anIntArray272 = new int[72]; intAgilityInterface.anIntArray240[0] = 19951; intAgilityInterface.anIntArray241[0] = 4; intAgilityInterface.anIntArray272[0] = 16; //Main sprite addSprite(19951, 0, 0, "mainframe"); //Control 19952 (0) intAgilityInterface.anIntArray240[1] = 19952; intAgilityInterface.anIntArray241[1] = 51; intAgilityInterface.anIntArray272[1] = 173; //Label addText(19952, "x50", wid, 0, 0xFF9040); //Control 19953 (1) intAgilityInterface.anIntArray240[2] = 19953; intAgilityInterface.anIntArray241[2] = 17; intAgilityInterface.anIntArray272[2] = 174; //Image addSprite(19953, 0, 0, "Agility_arena_ticket_detail"); //Control 19954 (2) intAgilityInterface.anIntArray240[3] = 19954; intAgilityInterface.anIntArray241[3] = 88; intAgilityInterface.anIntArray272[3] = 129; //Label addText(19954, "50,000 Agility Exp", wid, 1, 0xFF9040); //Control 19955 (3) intAgilityInterface.anIntArray240[4] = 19955; intAgilityInterface.anIntArray241[4] = 219; intAgilityInterface.anIntArray272[4] = 121; //Button addActionButton(19955, 65, 32, "Exchange Points", "Acceptbutton"); //TODO: Change the tooltip text //Control 19956 (4) intAgilityInterface.anIntArray240[5] = 19956; intAgilityInterface.anIntArray241[5] = 233; intAgilityInterface.anIntArray272[5] = 227; //Image addSprite(19956, 0, 0, "Agility_cape_t");
